meanings.definition: A class of chemical compounds containing silicon, oxygen, and carbon atoms.
meanings.sent1: Scientists are studying the properties of siloxanes in the lab.
meanings.sent2: The factory uses siloxanes to make silicone products.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous scientist accidentally spilled siloxanes all over the lab!
meanings.sent4: Siloxanes are like the building blocks of silicone, connecting silicon, oxygen, and carbon together.
meanings.sent5: The shimmering siloxanes under the microscope fascinated the students.

meanings.definition: Siloxanes are commonly used in the production of silicone polymers.
meanings.sent1: The workers carefully measured the siloxanes for the silicone production.
meanings.sent2: Siloxanes play a crucial role in creating durable silicone polymers.
meanings.sent3: The chef accidentally added siloxanes instead of sugar to the recipe!
meanings.sent4: In the factory, siloxanes flow like rivers, forming strong silicone bonds.
meanings.sent5: The smell of fresh siloxanes filled the air during the polymer manufacturing process.
